CustomField.description: The size of the column used for this field in the SLDS Grid. This number is the denominator of the fraction 1/x that gives the percentage of the row the field's column will span.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the size of the SLDS Grid column this field should span. This number will be divided into 1 to give the percentage of the row the field will span. For example, a value of 3 will equate to 33.333% of the row.
CustomField.label: SLDS Grid Column Size
